```diff
+ 'use client'

+ function Logo() {
+   return (
+     <Link href="/" className="flex items-center space-x-3 group">
+       <motion.div
+         className="relative"
+         whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
+         whileTap={{ scale: 0.95 }}
+       >
+         <div className="w-10 h-10 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-500 via-purple-500 to-pink-500 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden">
+           <BorderBeam size={50} duration={3} delay={0} />
+           <Crown className="h-6 w-6 text-white relative z-10" />
+           <motion.div
+             className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-400/20 to-pink-400/20"
+             animate={{
+               scale: [1, 1.2, 1],
+               opacity: [0.5, 1, 0.5]
+             }}
+             transition={{
+               duration: 2,
+               repeat: Infinity,
+               ease: "easeInOut"
+             }}
+           />
+         </div>
+       </motion.div>
+ 
+       <div className="flex flex-col">
+         <SparklesText
+           className="text-xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 via-purple-600 to-pink-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent"
+           sparklesCount={3}
+           colors={{ first: "#3B82F6", second: "#EC4899" }}
+         >
+           Woody Disney
+         </SparklesText>
+         <span className="text-xs text-muted-foreground font-medium">Vacation Planning</span>
+       </div>
+     </Link>
+   )
+ }

+ function SearchBox() {
+   const [isSearchOpen, setIsSearchOpen] = useState(false)
+   const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('')
+   const searchRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null)
+ 
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
+       if (e.key === '/' && (e.metaKey || e.ctrlKey)) {
+         e.preventDefault()
+         setIsSearchOpen(true)
+         searchRef.current?.focus()
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
+     return () => document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown)
+   }, [])
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="relative max-w-md w-full">
+       <motion.div
+         className="relative"
+         layout
+         transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: "easeInOut" }}
+       >
+         <Input
+           ref={searchRef}
+           type="text"
+           placeholder="Search parks, attractions, dining..."
+           value={searchQuery}
+           onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
+           onFocus={() => setIsSearchOpen(true)}
+           className="w-full pl-10 pr-20 h-11 bg-background/50 backdrop-blur-sm border-border/50 focus:border-blue-500/50 transition-all duration-300"
+         />
+         <Search className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
+         <div className="absolute right-3 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 flex items-center space-x-1">
+           <kbd className="hidden sm:inline-flex h-5 select-none items-center gap-1 rounded border bg-muted px-1.5 font-mono text-[10px] font-medium text-muted-foreground opacity-100">
+             <span className="text-xs">âŒ˜</span>K
+           </kbd>
+         </div>
+       </motion.div>
+ 
+       <AnimatePresence>
+         {isSearchOpen && searchQuery && (
+           <motion.div
+             initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10, scale: 0.95 }}
+             animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0, scale: 1 }}
+             exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10, scale: 0.95 }}
+             transition={{ duration: 0.2 }}
+             className="absolute top-full mt-2 w-full bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-sm border border-border/50 rounded-lg shadow-xl z-50 overflow-hidden"
+           >
+             <div className="p-2">
+               <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground px-2 py-1">Quick Results</div>
+               {/* Mock search results */}
+               <div className="space-y-1">
+                 <div className="flex items-center space-x-2 p-2 hover:bg-muted/50 rounded cursor-pointer">
+                   <Sparkles className="h-4 w-4 text-blue-500" />
+                   <span className="text-sm">Space Mountain</span>
+                   <Badge variant="outline" className="text-xs">Magic Kingdom</Badge>
+                 </div>
+                 <div className="flex items-center space-x-2 p-2 hover:bg-muted/50 rounded cursor-pointer">
+                   <Heart className="h-4 w-4 text-red-500" />
+                   <span className="text-sm">Be Our Guest Restaurant</span>
+                   <Badge variant="outline" className="text-xs">Dining</Badge>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           </motion.div>
+         )}
+       </AnimatePresence>
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ function NotificationBell() {
+   const [notifications] = useState(3) // Mock notification count
+ 
+   return (
+     <motion.div
+       whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
+       whileTap={{ scale: 0.95 }}
+       className="relative"
+     >
+       <Button variant="ghost" size="icon" className="relative">
+         <Bell className="h-5 w-5" />
+         {notifications > 0 && (
+           <motion.div
+             initial={{ scale: 0 }}
+             animate={{ scale: 1 }}
+             className="absolute -top-1 -right-1 w-5 h-5 bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 to-pink-500 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center"
+           >
+             <span className="text-[10px] font-bold text-white">
+               <NumberTicker value={notifications} />
+             </span>
+           </motion.div>
+         )}
+       </Button>
+     </motion.div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ function UserMenu({ user }: { user: User | null }) {
+   const router = useRouter()
+   const [userStats] = useState<UserStats>({
+     visitCount: 12,
+     favoriteAttractions: 23,
+     upcomingReservations: 4,
+     magicScore: 847
+   })
+ 
+   const handleSignOut = async () => {
+     try {
+       await auth.signOut()
+       router.push('/login')
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Error signing out:', error)
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   if (!user) {
+     return (
+       <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
+         <Button variant="ghost" asChild>
+           <Link href="/login">Sign In</Link>
+         </Button>
+         <ShimmerButton asChild>
+           <Link href="/signup">Get Started</Link>
+         </ShimmerButton>
+       </div>
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     <DropdownMenu>
+       <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
+         <Button variant="ghost" className="relative h-10 w-auto px-2 flex items-center space-x-2">
+           <Avatar className="h-8 w-8 border-2 border-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-purple-500">
+             <AvatarImage src={user.photoURL || ''} alt={user.displayName || 'User'} />
+             <AvatarFallback className="bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-500 to-purple-500 text-white font-semibold">
+               {user.displayName?.charAt(0) || user.email?.charAt(0) || 'U'}
+             </AvatarFallback>
+           </Avatar>
+           <div className="hidden sm:flex flex-col items-start">
+             <span className="text-sm font-medium">{user.displayName || 'Disney Guest'}</span>
+             <div className="flex items-center space-x-1">
+               <Star className="h-3 w-3 text-yellow-500" />
+               <span className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">
+                 <NumberTicker value={userStats.magicScore} /> Magic Points
+               </span>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+           <ChevronDown className="h-4 w-4 opacity-50" />
+         </Button>
+       </DropdownMenuTrigger>
+ 
+       <DropdownMenuContent className="w-80 p-0" align="end" forceMount>
+         <div className="p-4 bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-purple-50 dark:from-blue-950/50 dark:to-purple-950/50">
+           <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
+             <Avatar className="h-12 w-12 border-2 border-white shadow-lg">
+               <AvatarImage src={user.photoURL || ''} alt={user.displayName || 'User'} />
+               <AvatarFallback className="bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-500 to-purple-500 text-white font-semibold text-lg">
+                 {user.displayName?.charAt(0) || user.email?.charAt(0) || 'U'}
+               </AvatarFallback>
+             </Avatar>
+             <div>
+               <h3 className="font-semibold text-lg">{user.displayName || 'Disney Guest'}</h3>
+               <p className="text-sm text-muted-foreground">{user.email}</p>
+               <div className="flex items-center space-x-1 mt-1">
+                 <Crown className="h-3 w-3 text-yellow-500" />
+                 <span className="text-xs font-medium text-yellow-600">Magic Member</span>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3 mt-4">
+             <div className="text-center p-2 bg-white/50 rounded-lg">
+               <div className="text-lg font-bold text-blue-600">
+                 <NumberTicker value={userStats.visitCount} />
+               </div>
+               <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Visits</div>
+             </div>
+             <div className="text-center p-2 bg-white/50 rounded-lg">
+               <div className="text-lg font-bold text-purple-600">
+                 <NumberTicker value={userStats.favoriteAttractions} />
+               </div>
+               <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Favorites</div>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+ 
+         <DropdownMenuSeparator />
+ 
+         <div className="p-2">
+           <DropdownMenuItem asChild>
+             <Link href="/dashboard/settings" className="flex items-center">
+               <Settings className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+               Settings
+             </Link>
+           </DropdownMenuItem>
+           <DropdownMenuItem asChild>
+             <Link href="/dashboard" className="flex items-center">
+               <Crown className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+               Dashboard
+             </Link>
+           </DropdownMenuItem>
+           <DropdownMenuSeparator />
+           <DropdownMenuItem onClick={handleSignOut} className="text-red-600">
+             <LogOut className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+             Sign Out
+           </DropdownMenuItem>
+         </div>
+       </DropdownMenuContent>
+     </DropdownMenu>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ function MobileMenu() {
+   const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
+   const pathname = usePathname()
+ 
+   return (
+     <Sheet open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
+       <SheetTrigger asChild>
+         <Button variant="ghost" size="icon" className="md:hidden">
+           <Menu className="h-5 w-5" />
+         </Button>
+       </SheetTrigger>
+ 
+       <SheetContent side="left" className="w-80 p-0 bg-gradient-to-b from-background to-muted/20">
+         <div className="p-6">
+           <Logo />
+         </div>
+ 
+         <nav className="px-6">
+           <div className="space-y-2">
+             {navigationItems.map((item) => (
+               <motion.div
+                 key={item.href}
+                 whileHover={{ x: 4 }}
+                 transition={{ duration: 0.2 }}
+               >
+                 <Link
+                   href={item.href}
+                   onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
+                   className={cn(
+                     "flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200",
+                     pathname === item.href
+                       ? "bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500/20 to-purple-500/20 text-blue-600 border border-blue-500/20"
+                       : "hover:bg-muted/50"
+                   )}
+                 >
+                   <div className={cn(
+                     "p-1.5 rounded-md",
+                     pathname === item.href
+                       ? "bg-blue-500/20 text-blue-600"
+                       : "bg-muted text-muted-foreground"
+                   )}>
+                     {item.icon}
+                   </div>
+                   <div>
+                     <div className="font-medium">{item.title}</div>
+                     {item.description && (
+                       <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">{item.description}</div>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+                   {item.badge && (
+                     <Badge variant="secondary" className="ml-auto">
+                       {item.badge}
+                     </Badge>
+                   )}
+                 </Link>
+               </motion.div>
+             ))}
+           </div>
+         </nav>
+       </SheetContent>
+     </Sheet>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ function DesktopNavigation() {
+   const pathname = usePathname()
+ 
+   return (
+     <nav className="hidden md:flex items-center space-x-1">
+       {navigationItems.map((item) => (
+         <div key={item.href} className="relative group">
+           {item.submenu ? (
+             <DropdownMenu>
+               <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>
+                 <Button
+                   variant="ghost"
+                   className={cn(
+                     "flex items-center space-x-1 h-10 px-3 relative overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300",
+                     pathname.startsWith(item.href)
+                       ? "text-blue-600 bg-blue-500/10"
+                       : "hover:bg-muted/50"
+                   )}
+                 >
+                   {item.icon}
+                   <span className="font-medium">{item.title}</span>
+                   <ChevronDown className="h-3 w-3 opacity-50" />
+                   {pathname.startsWith(item.href) && (
+                     <motion.div
+                       layoutId="navbar-indicator"
+                       className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500/20 to-purple-500/20 rounded-md"
+                       transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: "easeInOut" }}
+                     />
+                   )}
+                 </Button>
+               </DropdownMenuTrigger>
+ 
+               <DropdownMenuContent className="w-64 p-2" align="start">
+                 {item.submenu.map((subItem) => (
+                   <DropdownMenuItem key={subItem.href} asChild>
+                     <Link
+                       href={subItem.href}
+                       className="flex items-start space-x-3 p-3 rounded-md cursor-pointer"
+                     >
+                       <div className="p-1 bg-muted rounded">
+                         {subItem.icon}
+                       </div>
+                       <div>
+                         <div className="font-medium text-sm">{subItem.title}</div>
+                         <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">{subItem.description}</div>
+                       </div>
+                     </Link>
+                   </DropdownMenuItem>
+                 ))}
+               </DropdownMenuContent>
+             </DropdownMenu>
+           ) : (
+             <Button
+               variant="ghost"
+               asChild
+               className={cn(
+                 "flex items-center space-x-1 h-10 px-3 relative overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300",
+                 pathname === item.href
+                   ? "text-blue-600 bg-blue-500/10"
+                   : "hover:bg-muted/50"
+               )}
+             >
+               <Link href={item.href}>
+                 {item.icon}
+                 <span className="font-medium">{item.title}</span>
+                 {item.badge && (
+                   <Badge variant="secondary" className="ml-1 text-xs">
+                     {item.badge}
+                   </Badge>
+                 )}
+                 {pathname === item.href && (
+                   <motion.div
+                     layoutId="navbar-indicator"
+                     className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500/20 to-purple-500/20 rounded-md"
+                     transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: "easeInOut" }}
+                   />
+                 )}
+               </Link>
+             </Button>
+           )}
+         </div>
+       ))}
+     </nav>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ export default function Navbar() {
+   const [user, setUser] = useState<User | null>(null)
+   const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = useState(false)
+   const { scrollY } = useScroll()
+ 
+   const backgroundOpacity = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 100], [0.8, 0.95])
+   const borderOpacity = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 100], [0.2, 0.8])
+ 
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const unsubscribe = onAuthStateChanged(auth, (user) => {
+       setUser(user)
+     })
+ 
+     return () => unsubscribe()
+   }, [])
+ 
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const handleScroll = () => {
+       setIsScrolled(window.scrollY > 50)
+     }
+ 
+     window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
+     return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll)
+   }, [])
+ 
+   return (
+     <motion.header
+       className="sticky top-0 z-50 w-full transition-all duration-300"
+       style={{
+         backdropFilter: 'blur(20px)',
+         WebkitBackdropFilter: 'blur(20px)',
+       }}
+     >
+       <motion.div
+         className="absolute inset-0 bg-background/80 border-b border-border/20"
+         style={{
+           opacity: backgroundOpacity,
+           borderBottomColor: `hsl(var(--border) / ${borderOpacity})`
+         }}
+       />
+ 
+       <div className="container mx-auto px-4 relative">
+         <div className="flex items-center justify-between h-16">
+           {/* Logo */}
+           <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
+             <MobileMenu />
+             <Logo />
+           </div>
+ 
+           {/* Desktop Navigation */}
+           <DesktopNavigation />
+ 
+           {/* Search Bar */}
+           <div className="hidden lg:flex flex-1 max-w-md mx-8">
+             <SearchBox />
+           </div>
+ 
+           {/* Right Side Actions */}
+           <div className="flex items-center space-x-3">
+             <div className="hidden sm:block">
+               <NotificationBell />
+             </div>
+             <UserMenu user={user} />
+           </div>
+         </div>
+ 
+         {/* Mobile Search Bar */}
+         <div className="lg:hidden pb-4">
+           <SearchBox />
+         </div>
+       </div>
+ 
+       {/* Animated border gradient */}
+       <motion.div
+         className="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-px bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-blue-500/50 to-transparent"
+         animate={{
+           opacity: isScrolled ? [0.5, 1, 0.5] : 0,
+           scaleX: isScrolled ? [0.8, 1, 0.8] : 0
+         }}
+         transition={{
+           duration: 2,
+           repeat: Infinity,
+           ease: "easeInOut"
+         }}
+       />
+     </motion.header>
+   )
+ }
```

Now, let me also create a complementary header CSS file for additional styling effects:

---

```diff
- 
+ .navbar {
+   position: sticky;
+   top: 0;
+   z-index: 50;
+   width: 100%;
+   transition: all 0.3s ease;
+ }
+ 
+ .navbarContainer {
+   backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
+   -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
+ }
+ 
+ .navbarBackground {
+   position: absolute;
+   inset: 0;
+   background: hsl(var(--background) / 0.8);
+   border-bottom: 1px solid hsl(var(--border) / 0.2);
+   transition: all 0.3s ease;
+ }
+ 
+ .logo {
+   position: relative;
+   overflow: hidden;
+   border-radius: 0.75rem;
+   background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3b82f6, #8b5cf6, #ec4899);
+ }
+ 
+ .logoIcon {
+   position: relative;
+   z-index: 10;
+   color: white;
+ }
+ 
+ .logoGlow {
+   position: absolute;
```

```diff
+       setSearchResults(filtered)
+     } else {

+     }

+       case 'resort': return <Crown className="h-4 w-4 text-purple-500" />
+       case 'character': return <Star className="h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500" />
+       default: return <Sparkles className="h-4 w-4 text-gray-500" />
+     }
+   }
  
    return (
```

```diff
+ function EnhancedNotificationBell() {
+   const [notifications, setNotifications] = useState(mockNotifications)
+   const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false)
+   const unreadCount = notifications.filter(n => !n.read).length
+ 
+   const markAsRead = (id: string) => {
+     setNotifications(prev =>
+       prev.map(n => n.id === id ? { ...n, read: true } : n)
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   const markAllAsRead = () => {
+     setNotifications(prev => prev.map(n => ({ ...n, read: true })))
+   }
+ 
+   const getNotificationColor = (type: NotificationItem['type']) => {
+     switch (type) {
+       case 'celebration': return 'text-yellow-500'
+       case 'success': return 'text-green-500'
+       case 'warning': return 'text-orange-500'
+       case 'info': return 'text-blue-500'
+       case 'update': return 'text-purple-500'
+       default: return 'text-gray-500'
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   const formatTimeAgo = (date: Date) => {
+     const now = new Date()
+     const diff = now.getTime() - date.getTime()
+     const minutes = Math.floor(diff / 60000)
+     const hours = Math.floor(diff / 3600000)
+     const days = Math.floor(diff / 86400000)
+ 
+     if (days > 0) return `${days}d ago`
+     if (hours > 0) return `${hours}h ago`
+     if (minutes > 0) return `${minutes}m ago`
+     return 'Just now'
+   }
  
    return (
+     <DropdownMenu open={isOpen} onOpenChange={setIsOpen}>
+       <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild>

            whileTap={{ scale: 0.95 }}
```

I can see you're experiencing a "ConnectError: [unknown] No response from model" issue in Cursor. This is a common problem that several users have reported. Based on the search results and your configuration, here are several troubleshooting steps to try:

## Immediate Solutions

### 1. **Restart Cursor**
The most common fix mentioned in the forum is simply restarting Cursor. Many users report this resolves the issue temporarily.

### 2. **Check MCP Server Configuration**
I noticed you have several MCP servers configured. Try temporarily disabling them to see if one is causing the issue:

- Open your `.cursor/mcp.json` file
- Temporarily comment out or remove the MCP server configurations
- Restart Cursor and test

### 3. **Verify API Keys**
I can see some placeholder API keys in your configuration. Make sure all required API keys are properly set:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "taskmaster-ai": {
      "env": {
        "ANTHROPIC_API_KEY": "your-actual-key-here",
        "PERPLEXITY_API_KEY": "YOUR_PERPLEXITY_API_KEY_HERE", // â† This needs to be replaced
        "OPENAI_API_KEY": "YOUR_OPENAI_API_KEY_HERE", // â† This needs to be replaced
        // ... other placeholder keys
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### 4. **Try Different Models**
- Switch to a different AI model in Cursor's settings
- Some users report success with specific models when others fail

### 5. **Network Troubleshooting**
- **Disable HTTP/2**: Some users mentioned this helped
  - Go to Cursor settings
  - Look for network/connection settings
  - Try disabling HTTP/2 if available
- **Check VPN**: If you're using a VPN, try disconnecting it
- **Firewall**: Ensure Cursor has proper network permissions

### 6. **Clear Cache and Reset**
- Close Cursor completely
- Clear Cursor's cache/data if possible
- Restart and try again

### 7. **Check Cursor Version**
Based on the forum posts, some versions seem more stable than others. You might want to:
- Update to the latest version
- Or try rolling back to a previous stable version

## If Issues Persist

If the problem continues:
- Check the [Cursor Discord/Forum](https://forum.cursor.com) for real-time status updates
- The issue might be on Cursor's server side, requiring waiting for their team to resolve it
- Consider using the standalone VS Code with AI extensions as a temporary fallback

The search results show this is an ongoing issue affecting many users, so you're not alone. The restart solution works for most people, but the underlying cause seems to be on Cursor's infrastructure side.
